Ambush Expert.Effects: Select up to two fighters in the warb&. This Fighter gains the Infiltrate ability
Ambush Expert.Name: Ambush Expert

Anti-Large.Effects: -A Fighter using this weapon adds 1 to their hit roll when fighting Cavalry or Monsters
Anti-Large.Name: Anti-Large

Barbed Arrows.Effects: Ranged attacks made with Barbed Arrows add 1 to any wound rolls made
Barbed Arrows.Name: Barbed Arrows

Black Powder.Effects: After making a shoot action with a weapon with this trait roll a D10. If the result is 6+, the weapon is reloaded successfully. If the result is a 1-5 the weapon is out of ammo and a reload action must be made before this weapon can be fire again. Reload actions are automatically successful
Black Powder.Name: Black Powder

Blessing of the Lady.Effects:
-Close Combat attacks made against this fighter are resolved at -1 to hit
-Ranged attacks made against this fighter are resolved at -2 to hit
Blessing of the Lady.Name: Blessing of the Lady

Blessings of Asuryan.Effects: -Attacks made against this fighter are resolved at -2 to hit
Blessings of Asuryan.Name: Blessings of Asuryan

Bred for War.Effects:
-This Mount gets +1 Attack & improves its Weapon Skill by 1
 -If this This Fighter would be pinned subtract 3" from its movement the next time it activates instead (This penalty does not stack)
Bred for War.Name: Bred for War

Bred to the Saddle.Effects: This Fighter must start the game mounted
Bred to the Saddle.Name: Bred to the Saddle

Choppas.Effects: Fighters with this ability get +1 Strength in the first round of close combat & cannot benefit from the parry rule
Choppas.Name: Choppas

Commander.Effects: Order (Basic) – Pick a friendly fighter within 6’’. That fighter can immediately make two actions as though it were their turn to activate, even if they are not Ready. If they are Ready, these actions do not remove their Ready marker.
Commander.Name: Commander

Condemn.Effects: At the beginning of the game this Fighter elects a single enemy Fighter to condemn. This Fighter wounds the condemned fighter on 3+ with close combat & ranged attacks
Condemn.Name: Condemn

Counter Charge.Effects: When an enemy Fighter moves into engagement range with a friendly Fighter within 6"  this Fighter, & this Fighter is standing & active, this Fighter may make immediate, out of sequence Charge action against that enemy Fighter once it has completed its Charge Action.
Counter Charge.Name: Counter Charge

Counter-Attack.Effects: When this fighter makes Reaction attacks in close combat, they roll one additional Attack dice for each of the attacker’s Attacks that failed to hit
Counter-Attack.Name: Counter-Attack

Crushing Blow.Effects: Before rolling to hit for the fighter's close combat attacks, the controlling player can nominate one dice to make a Crushing Blow. If that dice hits, the attack’s Strength & Damage are each increased by one.
Crushing Blow.Name: Crushing Blow

Deathblow.Effects: If a Fighter with this ability is taken out of action in Close Combat, it will immediately make a single Attack back against the Fighter that took it out of acction before being removed
Deathblow.Name: Deathblow

Defensive.Effects: -A Fighter is only required to allocate a single attack to a Defensive weapon in close combat
Defensive.Name: Defensive

Dodge (Close Combat).Effects: -If this fighter is unmounted close combat attacks made against it are resolved at -1 to hit
Dodge (Close Combat).Name: Dodge (Close Combat)

Dodge (Ranged).Effects: -If this fighter is unmounted ranged attacks made against it are resolved at -1 to hit
Dodge (Ranged).Name: Dodge (Ranged)

Duty.Effects: Whent his Fighter fails a Cool check roll the check again. If passed on the second attmept, this Fighter falls back as normal but will automatically regroup at the end of the round
Duty.Name: Duty

Dwarven Crafted.Effects: This Fighter re-rolls all to hit rolls of 1 when using handguns, pistols & crossbows
Dwarven Crafted.Name: Dwarven Crafted

Elven Cloak.Effects: Ranged attacks made against a Fighter equipped with an Elven Cloak are resolved at -1 to hit
Elven Cloak.Name: Elven Cloak

Extra Leverage.Effects: At the beginning of combat a fighter may opt to utilize this weapon in a manner that provides additional power. This weapon gains the Unwieldly ability and attacks made with this weapon are resolved at +1 Strength
Extra Leverage.Name: Extra Leverage

Firelance.Effects: A Fire Lance may be used in the first round of combat as an additional attack using the following profile: Strength 4, AP 2, Blaze
Firelance.Name: Firelance

Frenzy.Effects: In the turn this fighter moves into Engagement range with an enemy fighter, they gain an additional D3 Attacks. However, their hit rolls suffer a -1 modifier.
Frenzy.Name: Frenzy

Gas.Effects: When a fighter is hit by an attack made by a Gas weapon, they are not Pinned and a wound roll is not made. Instead, roll a D6. If the result is equal to or higher than the target’s Toughness, or is a natural 10, make an Injury roll for them (regardless of their Wounds characteristic). If the roll is lower than the target’s Toughness, they shrug off the effects of the gas – no save roll can be made.
Gas.Name: Gas

Grenade.Effects: This weapon can only be fired 2 times in the course of a game
Grenade.Name: Grenade

Hit & Run Specialist.Effects: After resolving a charge activation, this fighter may choose to take an intitiative test. If successful, thid fighter may disengage from this combat & make a consolidation move of up to 2"
Hit & Run Specialist.Name: Hit & Run Specialist

Hold the Line.Effects: This Fighter & friendly Fighters within 3" of this Fighter may roll 3 dice & pick the highest 2 results when taking any Cool checks
Hold the Line.Name: Hold the Line

Hooked.Effects: If an enemy Fighter targeted by attacks made with this weapon is equipped with a shield, reduce that Fighter's Armour save by 1
Hooked.Name: Hooked

Horse Lords.Effects: Mounts used by this Fighter do not suffer the normal -1 to Movement for Barding
Horse Lords.Name: Horse Lords

Infiltrate.Effects: If this fighter should be set up at the start of a battle, they may instead placed to one side. Then, immediately before the start of the first round, their controlling player may set them up anywhere on the battlefield that is not visible to any enemy fighters, & not within 6’’ of any of them. If both players have fighters with this skill, take turns to set one up, starting with the winner of a roll-off.
Infiltrate.Name: Infiltrate

Iron Will.Effects: Subtract 1 from the result of any Bottle rolls whilst this fighter is on the battlefield & is not Seriously Injured.
Iron Will.Name: Iron Will

Jihad.Effects: Once per game, when this Fighter is activated it may call a Jihad As a free action. In the turn a Jihad is called, every Fighter in the warb& may add 1 to their Movement Characteristic
Jihad.Name: Jihad

Lance.Effects: -Models equipped with this weapon gains +2 strength and +1 AP in the turn they make Charge or Ride By attacks while mounted
Lance.Name: Lance

Lead by Example.Effects: Whenever this fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action in close combat, friendly fighters within 6" get +1 to hit until the end of the round
Lead by Example.Name: Lead by Example

Lion Rampant.Effects: Two handed weapons used by a Fighter with this ability gain the Parry ability
Lion Rampant.Name: Lion Rampant

Mark of Tzeentch.Effects: -Attacks made against this fighter are resolved at -1 to hit
Mark of Tzeentch.Name: Mark of Tzeentch

Markof Nurgle.Effects: This Fighter gains +1 Toughness & Reduces its Movement by 1
Markof Nurgle.Name: Markof Nurgle

Martial Prowess.Effects: This Fighter re-rolls 1's when rolling to hit in close combat
Martial Prowess.Name: Martial Prowess

Melee.Effects: This weapon can be used during close combat attacks.
Melee.Name: Melee

Multi-Shot (X).Effects:
-A weapon with Multi-Shot can be fired (X) times per Shoot action
-Ranged attacks made using the Multi-Shot (X) ability receive -1 to hit
Multi-Shot (X).Name: Multi-Shot (X)

Murderous Prowess.Effects: This Fighter re-rolls 1's when rolling to wound in close combat
Murderous Prowess.Name: Murderous Prowess

Paired.Effects: A fighter that is armed with Paired weapons counts as being armed with dual weapons with the Melee trait for the purposes of calculating the number of Attack dice they will roll. Additionally, when making a Charge (Double) action, their Attacks characteristic is doubled.
Paired.Name: Paired

Parry.Effects: When an enemy Fighter makes close combat attacks against a Fighter armed with a weapon with the Parry ability, the defending Fighter may chose to have the attacking Fighter reroll one successful hit roll. This ability can only be used once per turn.
Parry.Name: Parry

Peasant's Duty.Effects: Fighters with the Peasant's Duty may use the cool characteristic of any friendly Fighters with the Questing Vow or the Grail Vow within 6"
Peasant's Duty.Name: Peasant's Duty

Poison Attacks.Effects: A Fighter with this ability gets +1 to any wound rolls made in close combat
Poison Attacks.Name: Poison Attacks

Pulverise.Effects: After making an Injury roll for an attack made by this weapon, the attacking player can roll a D6. If the result is equal to or higher than the target's Toughness, or is a natural 10, they can change one Injury dice from a Flesh Wound result to a Serious Injury result.
Pulverise.Name: Pulverise

Rain of Blows.Effects: This fighter treats the Fight action as Fight (Simple) rather than Fight (Basic). In other words, this fighter may make two Fight (Simple) actions when activated.
Rain of Blows.Name: Rain of Blows

Rending.Effects: If the roll to wound with a Rending weapon is a natural 10 the attack causes 1 extra point of damage.
Rending.Name: Rending

Ride By.Effects: If a Mounted fighter moves within the Long range distance of one of its close combat weapons to an enemy fighter, the Mounted fighter may make a single attack with that weapon. The enemy fighter may make a single reaction attack if the mounted fighter comes within the Long range distance of any of any of its close combat weapons
Ride By.Name: Ride By

Scaley Skin.Effects: A Fighter with Scaley skin is equipped with the scaley skin armour variant
Scaley Skin.Name: Scaley Skin

Scout.Effects: This Fighter can make up to 2 move activations prior to the beginning of the first round. If enemy fighters also have this ability roll of to determine who activates first
Scout.Name: Scout

Sea Dragon Cloak.Effects: -Ranged attacks made against this Fighter receive a -1 modifier to hit
Sea Dragon Cloak.Name: Sea Dragon Cloak

Shield (10+).Effects: -A Fighter equipped with a shield with this trait improves their Armour Save by 1
Shield (10+).Name: Shield (10+)

Shield Wall!.Effects:
If this fighter is within 2" of 2 other friendly fighters with the Shieldwall ability, who are equipped with a shield & standing and are not carrying an unwieldly weapon, attacks made against this Fighter are resolved at -2 to hit
'If a Fighter who is within 2" of 2 other friendly fighters with the Shieldwall ability, who are equipped with a shield & standing and are not carrying an Unwieldly weapon, is hit with a ranged attack they must take a Cool test. If this test is failed, the Fighter becomes pinned
Shield Wall!.Name: Shield Wall!

Short and Nimble.Effects: Enemies attacking Fighters with this rule suffer -1 To Hit in close combat
Short and Nimble.Name: Short and Nimble

Sidearm.Effects:
-Weapons with this Trait can be used to make ranged attacks, and can also be used in close combat to make a single attack in a close combat. Note that their Accuracy bonus only applies when making a ranged attack, not when used to make a close combat attack.
-A weapon with the Sidearm trait can only be fired once during a close combat. If the combat goes on past the turn in which a sidear, is fire in close combat, this model may not select this weapon to make attacks with until the close combat is completed
Sidearm.Name: Sidearm

Size Matters.Effects: Fighters with this special rule treat Goblins as having the "Hot-Headed" special rule
Size Matters.Name: Size Matters

Skirmisher.Effects: The fighter may move up to double their Movement characteristic & then make an attack with a ranged weapons. The hit roll suffers an additional -1 modifier
Skirmisher.Name: Skirmisher

Step Aside.Effects:
If the fighter is hit in close combat, the fighter can attempt to step aside. Make an Initiative check for them. If the check is passed, the attack misses. This skill can only
be used once per enemy in each round or close combat
Step Aside.Name: Step Aside

Strength in Numbers.Effects: This Fighter improves its Cool characteristic by 1 for each friendly Fighter with this ability within 3"
Strength in Numbers.Name: Strength in Numbers

Strike First.Effects:
-A Fighter with a spear strikes first with a single attack when charged. This only applies in the first turn of a close combat.
-If the initial attack made with the strike first special rule causes a serious injury the fighter can make the coup de grace action with its remaining attacks
Strike First.Name: Strike First

Support Fire.Effects: When an enemy Fighter moves into engagement range with a friendly Fighter within 6"  this Fighter, & this Fighter is standing & active, this Fighter may make immediate, out of sequence Shooting action against that enemy Fighter. This attack does not cause pinning
Support Fire.Name: Support Fire

The Grail Vow.Effects:
-Fighters with the Questing Vow must also take the Knight's Vow & The Questing Vow. Only 1 Fighter per warb& may take The Grail Vow
-This Fighter gains +1 Toughness, +1 Attack, & adds 1 to its Deflection save
The Grail Vow.Name: The Grail Vow

The Knight's Vow.Effects: This Fighter improves its Weapon Skill by 1
The Knight's Vow.Name: The Knight's Vow

Trollblooded.Effects: -This Fighter improves its armour save by 3
Trollblooded.Name: Trollblooded

True Grit.Effects: -When making an Injury roll for the fighter, roll one less Injury dice (for example, a Damage 2 weapon would roll one dice). Against attacks with Damage 1, roll two dice – the player controlling the fighter with True Grit, can then choose one dice to discard before the effects of the other are resolved.
True Grit.Name: True Grit

Unbreakable.Effects: This Fighter automatically passes any cool checks it is required to make
Unbreakable.Name: Unbreakable

Unwieldly.Effects: A fighter who uses a weapon with both the Unwieldy and Melee traits in close combat cannot use a second weapon at the same time
Unwieldly.Name: Unwieldly

Valhalla.Effects: This Fighter does not take Cool checks when friendly fighters within 3" are taken out of action
Valhalla.Name: Valhalla

Versatile.Effects:
-The wielder of a Versatile weapon does not need to be in base contact with an enemy fighter in order to Engage them in melee during their activation. They may Engage and make close combat attacks against an enemy fighter during their activation, so long as the distance between their base and that of the enemy fighter is equal to or less than the distance shown for the Versatile weapon’s Long range characteristic.
-The enemy fighter is considered to be Engaged, but may not in turn be Engaging the fighter armed with the Versatile weapon unless they too are armed with a Versatile weapon, and so may not be able to make Reaction attacks.
Versatile.Name: Versatile

Waaagh!.Effects: Once per game, when this Fighter is activated it may call a Waaagh! As a free action. In the turn a Waaagh! is called, every Fighter in the warband may add 1 to their Movement Characteristic
Waaagh!.Name: Waaagh!

Warbeast.Effects: During this Fighters activation, if it is riderless it, this Fighter must move directly towards the nearest enemy Fighter and attempt to engage it in close combat
Warbeast.Name: Warbeast

Warpaint.Effects: -Attacks made against this Fighter are resolved at -1 to hit
Warpaint.Name: Warpaint

Way of the Warrior.Effects: Issue Challenge Basic Action - Choose an enemy fighter within 12". Until the end of this round, or until the chosen fighter is attacked by a friendly fighter, they must make a Intelligence check if they wish to make a ranged or close combat attack that targets any fighter other than the fighter who issued the challenge
Way of the Warrior.Name: Way of the Warrior

White Lion Cloak.Effects: -Ranged attacks made against this Fighter receive a -1 modifier to hit
White Lion Cloak.Name: White Lion Cloak

Will of Chaos.Effects: This Fighter counts as passing its first failed cool check
Will of Chaos.Name: Will of Chaos

Barding.Effects: -Fighters with Barding Subtract 1 from their Movement Characteristic
Barding.Name: Barding

Breastplate.Effects: -This item can only be equipped if this Fighter has made no selection for Armour or has selected Padded Armour
Breastplate.Name: Breastplate

Full Helm.Effects:
-Reduce the result of any injury chart rolls made against this fighter by 1
-This Fighter's initiative is reduced by 1
-Reduce the Ballistic Skill of this Fighter by 1
Full Helm.Name: Full Helm

Full Plate.Effects: -Reduce the Movement Characteristic of this Fighter by 1
Full Plate.Name: Full Plate

Gromril Plate.Effects: -Reduce the AP of attacks made against this Fighter by 1
Gromril Plate.Name: Gromril Plate

Half Helm.Effects: -A Fighter with a helmet treats wound rolls of 1-6 made against it as Flesh Wounds
Half Helm.Name: Half Helm

Helmet.Effects: - A Fighter with a helmet treats wound rolls of 1-6 made against it as Flesh Wounds
Helmet.Name: Helmet

Large Shield.Effects:
-A Fighter equipped with a Large Shield shield gains a 9+ Deflection save
 -In close combat, a Large Shield only grants Deflection saves when utilized alongside a single Melee weapon without the Unwieldly trait
Large Shield.Name: Large Shield

Mantlet.Effects: -A Fighter equipped with a Mantlet loses the benefits of a Mantlet if it moves from its starting location
Mantlet.Name: Mantlet

Padded Mail.Effects: -Reduce the Movement Characteristic of this Fighter by 1
Padded Mail.Name: Padded Mail

Padded Mail Hauberk.Effects: -Reduce the Movement Characteristic of this Fighter by 1
Padded Mail Hauberk.Name: Padded Mail Hauberk

Padded Scale Armour.Effects: -Reduce the AP of attacks made against this Fighter by 1
Padded Scale Armour.Name: Padded Scale Armour

Plate Mail.Effects: -Reduce the Movement Characteristic of this Fighter by 1
Plate Mail.Name: Plate Mail

Scale Armour.Effects: -Reduce the AP of attacks made against this Fighter by 1
Scale Armour.Name: Scale Armour

Scale Mail.Effects: -Reduce the AP of attacks made against this Fighter by 1
Scale Mail.Name: Scale Mail

Small Shield.Effects:
-A Fighter equipped with a Small Shield shield gains a 10+ Deflection save
 -In close combat, a Small Shield only grants Deflection saves when utilized alongside a single Melee weapon without the Unwieldly trait
Small Shield.Name: Small Shield
